about_the_game:
Extreme Tag! is a fun, fast-paced platformer party game.

Tag is the main gamemode of Extreme Tag!. One player is selected to be IT and will explode after 30 seconds; however, if they run into another player, they pass the bomb on to them, and some extra seconds are added. The last player remaining wins!

In Infection, one player is selected to be IT; they must tag other players to convert them into other Infected before the time runs out. If time runs out, everyone not Infected wins!

In Hide and Seek, one player is selected to be the Seeker; this player must single-handedly find ALL other players and tag them before time runs out to win. If time runs out, all the other players win!

Laser Tag is a free-for-all gamemode where all players must eliminate each other with their Laser Gun to earn points. At certain intervals, one player is selected to be IT; they will then be worth 3 points per kill instead of 1, but they will stay IT until they are eliminated. The first player to score 15 points wins!

Create your own maps with our very own map creator! Import an existing .fbx file as a base, then you can add music and change colors on the objects.

Customize your player’s shirt, pants, and shoes to be whatever color you desire! Hats are available in the store for purchase, and a few free ones are given to all players. Additionally, as you level up, you can obtain even more hats for free! We encourage players to try out different clothing color themes to best represent themselves in this fun game for all!
